meaningMnemonic: If you eat a <radical>rice paddy</radical> the size of the <radical>moon</radical>, your <kanji>stomach</kanji> is going to hurt. All the rice in a rice paddy the size of the moon is way too much rice for anyone to consume. If you do, your stomach is going to ache like crazy.
readingMnemonic: From the sky, an eagle swoops down and flies right into your distended <kanji>stomach</kanji>. Bam! The <reading>ea</reading>gle (い) hits your stomach and you vomit up the entire moon sized rice paddy.
